extendedInfo.description: RoundTimer for exercises like interval training.Easy setup in a workflow diagramm:- Different duration for 3 phases (prep, activity, pause)- Activity and pause phase can be repeated.- acustic and vibrations signalsSave the setup1.3 Round Timer: - Default signal is 2 sec- Extended round selection- Doesn't run properly on Droid

reviews.comment: Exactly what I needed. But the txt in the get list is way too small. And u can\'t modify a stored setting... U need to save it, and delete the old one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked very good on the droid. WOULD BE a five star if it ran in the background while the phone is locked
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked fine on Droid for me. Best free timer for intervals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So awsome. Im a PT and this is a great tool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is perfect for Cycling interval training. 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad, is versatil and very configurable but it
reviews.comment: Not bad, is versatil and very configurable but it is not useful for what we need. Take in mind that when we use this we are in activity. Example: text (numbers) is incredible tiny (and I have a 5\" screen).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great tool, would like to have a way to create shortcuts for saved configurations, too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Quite useful and customizable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful app. Would be better if it would alert while phone is asleep.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Useful tool for realistic time mgt in more than training. Kid mgt, housekeeping, grading, unpleasant tasks - ADDers\' dream!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs a 25 minute timer!! Ongoing notification would be helpful too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. Jus wish it gave u a boxing bell tone lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it. All i\'d ask for is the ability for a warning noise as well. IE a thirty to ten second warning at the end of each noise. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great! Sound needs to be way louder. Hard to hear during full contact sparring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force close very first use, just as preperation countdown finished. Xperia x10i.

reviews.comment: Didn\'t work for my Droid eris. It forced closed every time I pushed start. The HIIP Interval Timer is better.

reviews.comment: Wrked gr8 on my g1 but on my x10 its defective so uninstalled such a shame as I had rated it 5 stars but not now

reviews.comment: Force close at end of 1st round on HTC hero. Please fix

reviews.comment: Free and works perfectly

reviews.comment: Love this! Does exactly what i needed, an interval that works great! Thank you!
